Sentencas: Lanthanum silicate oxyapatite (LSO) is an encouraging material for its use as an electrolyte in intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Influence of the porosity caused by incomplete sintering on the mechanical behaviour of lanthanum silicate oxyapatite

Sentencas: There is a vacancy in knowledge respecting to LSO's mechanical properties, and thus they are the scope of research of the present work.
Titulo: Influence of the porosity caused by incomplete sintering on the mechanical behaviour of lanthanum silicate oxyapatite

Sentencas: Isostatically pressed bars were sintered at temperatures from 1200 degrees C to 1500 degrees C.
Titulo: Influence of the porosity caused by incomplete sintering on the mechanical behaviour of lanthanum silicate oxyapatite

Sentencas: The dependence of Young's modulus with porosity was fitted using three different modeling curves, and extrapolated for a fully dense material.
Titulo: Influence of the porosity caused by incomplete sintering on the mechanical behaviour of lanthanum silicate oxyapatite

Sentencas: The fitting of these equations give an E-0 between 144 GPa and 169 GPa.
Titulo: Influence of the porosity caused by incomplete sintering on the mechanical behaviour of lanthanum silicate oxyapatite

Sentencas: This is the first time that LSO's Young's modulus is reported.
Titulo: Influence of the porosity caused by incomplete sintering on the mechanical behaviour of lanthanum silicate oxyapatite

Sentencas: Flexural strength,Vickers hardness, fracture toughness (K-1c) from microindentation cracks and nanohardness were also measured.
Titulo: Influence of the porosity caused by incomplete sintering on the mechanical behaviour of lanthanum silicate oxyapatite

Sentencas: Scanning electron micrography was performed on both a sub-sintered and the most sintered sample, and the microstructure and fracture mechanism were analyzed.
Titulo: Influence of the porosity caused by incomplete sintering on the mechanical behaviour of lanthanum silicate oxyapatite

Sentencas: In general, the mechanical behaviour is similar to other intermediate temperature solid oxide electrolytes.
Titulo: Influence of the porosity caused by incomplete sintering on the mechanical behaviour of lanthanum silicate oxyapatite

Sentencas: The fracture mechanism of the most sintered sample makes it well-suited for future SOFC applications.
Titulo: Influence of the porosity caused by incomplete sintering on the mechanical behaviour of lanthanum silicate oxyapatite
